overview:
Managing Director of Ba Recruitment, a Derbyshire based recruitment business for professional accounts and administration staff. Fixed Fee Recruitment across the East Midlands. Managing Director of Job Affair Ltd, hosting a suite of UK based job boards.

The first trial for the jobboard business is www.EastMidlandsJobs.co.uk this site was built with the idea of allowing employers only to post up their jobs in the local area.

www.JobAffair.co.uk is the vehicle that I have created to set-up, develop and manage my portfolio of job related websites, examples of these working websites now include; www.EastMidlandsJobs.co.uk an Employer only job advertising site and www.Just4Medical.co.uk an exciting UK based job advertising platform for all manner of Medical jobs in the UK.
